Articles.Content:
Once you have done science from all celestial bodies you probably would have marooned some kerbals i also recommend you accept some rescue kerbal contracts and you must build any craft that will recue them all in the least amount of money. Refuel missions are not allowed but mining is allowed and docking to debris is also allowed

rule

there must be at least 10kerbals you rescue
Time to go cheat and use hyperedit, the debug menu, and OP mods!

For this to be a challenge, you'll need to add some specifics, such as determining a precise goal and a way to assign scores or specify a winner. Look over the challenge guidelines and see what you can come up with.
